text: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ نُوحٖۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا

translation.en: And how many have We destroyed from the generations after Noah. And sufficient is your Lord, concerning the sins of His servants, as Acquainted and Seeing
translation.id: Dan berapa banyak kaum setelah Nuh, yang telah Kami binasakan. Dan cukuplah Tuhanmu Yang Maha Mengetahui, Maha Melihat dosa hamba-hamba-Nya
